title: Calories in Wonton Soup
meta_description: Discover calories in wonton soup per cup serving, including macros, sodium details, and easy tweaks for your bowl.
assumptions: Restaurant-style with pork-filled wontons, chicken broth, green onions, bok choy; 1 cup (240 ml) serving, no added MSG.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, restaurant, wonton filling, broth type, and portion size. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One cup of wonton soup contains about 71 calories and 4g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for quick label comparisons.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of wonton soup?
Is wonton soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1040 mg sodium per cup due to the brothâ€”opt for low-sodium versions.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in wonton soup?
faqs.a: Around 8.4 g carbs per cup, mostly from the wonton wrappers.

faqs.q: Calories in wonton soup vs. egg drop soup?
faqs.a: Wonton soup has ~71 kcal per cup; egg drop is similar at 65-75 kcal but lower protein.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in wonton soup?
faqs.a: Use veggie fillings, fewer wontons, or homemade broth to cut 15-40 kcal per serving.
